app_description: E transmate Director is a professional translation application that supports text and voice translation and you can also choose to take a photo to translate it can help you communicate effectively in both work and life scenarios. In text translation you need to manually enter the text you need to translate when you choose voice translation click on record to get the translated translation when you take a photo E transmate Director can also quickly extract your text content and translate it into your target language. With E transmate Director you can Online Text Translation Translate with a single click of the camera You can translate any version you want Add your translation results to your favorites View your translation history Why to use E transmate Director for Language selection Speech Recognition Daily English learning No account required easy to use
